root.name: Mad Dog McCree
root.description: OverviewMad Dog McCree is an FMV shooter originally developed and published by American Laser Games and released on multiple platforms.GameplayThe game begins as you walk into an old west town. You are quickly greeted by a rambling prospector played by Ben Zeller. He informs that a gang of gunslingers have over run the town and locked the sheriff in his own jail. As you progress through the game you must move up the chain of command and eventually kill the gang leader.This game has cemented itself into the catacombs of video game culture as a cult classic. The over acting, memorable sound design, and satisfying shooting has made it both famous and infamous in the gaming community.
